trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Southampton
There were no other sightings in Southampton on or around December 21st 2008
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting at the intersection of a residential road and a major commuter road and to my northwest direction, across the street above the woods in the sky was a ray of white light. out of this white light came a green, shining object. this object hurled, and sorta swooped down toward the ground like a meteor and had a bluish\white trail behind it like the tail of a comet. at one point, the object turned solid gray and i could make out a disc shape. what sent a chill down my spine was that i could see a reflection on the surface of the object. the tail soon diminished and the object turned green again and a white light opened in front of it. the object shot down into the light and completely disappeared. i actually thought the object had crashed into the woods, it was so low. this event only lasted twelve seconds and was witnessed by my friend in the passenger seat as well.
Summary: UFO exits wormhole then enters another.
